messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

not working sent monday re starter ad hi still working problem allowing run desktop or search only option run administrator have attached logs requested although there seem be any information there kind regards sent starter ad hello please be advised you have granted access if application already installed your machine icon should be present your desktop or you search for via start otherwise please use attached order reinstall run desktop or search below icon appear your tray right click icon click connect domain credentials be used please test access resources via outside guest qualifies let know if works properly if you still experiencing issues please provide with logs program files log for further investigation thank you kind regards analyst ext hub sent monday re starter ad hi following below have access working fine but unable run successfully does accept original or amended password please you assist thanks wrote please refer below confirm thanks sent device original message date starter ad hello please be advised we have granted for license she should be able use also we have checked her profile should work fine appears she was able log if further assistance required please let know thank you kind regards analyst ext hub sent monday re starter ad hi being assured friday issues relating had resolved she sent text stating for working running either accepting original or amended password what problem ll call thing tomorrow
